summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to live-work units, authorizing live-work units, establishing development standards for live-work units that are located at street level in Commercial and Neighborhood Commercial zones, correcting minor errors, and amending SMC Sections 23.42.106, 23.46.004, 23.46.006, 23.46.012, 23.47.004, 23.47.024, 23.47.032, 23.47.036, 23.47.042, 23.48.016, 23.49.008, 23.49.011, 23.49.016, 23.49.026, 23.49.146, 23.50.012, 23.53.005, 23.53.015, 23.53.025, 23.53.030, 23.54.015, 23.55.028, 23.71.038, 23.73.010, 23.84.004, 23.84.024, 23.90.006, 25.06.110, and 25.06.130.
